Car.Name: Audi
Car.FullModel: 2.0 TDI Black Edition Estate 5dr Diesel Manual Euro 5 (s/s) (177 ps)
Car.Description: - This Estate offers a balance of performance, efficiency, and technology. Powered by a 2.0L 4_cylinder engine, it delivers approximately 174 horsepower and is paired with 6_speed manual transmission. - Inside, the vehicle features a spacious cabin with seating for five, half leather upholstery, and a user_friendly infotainment system, with the option to spec the car with an upgraded infotainment screen, which includes apple car play and android auto, some of the tech include Bluetooth, electric hand brake, front and rear sensors, electric boot. contact for more information. - - Technical data: - Fuel efficiency ranges from 58.9 mpg combined as stated by the manufacturers. Cargo space is generous, with rear seats that fold down to expand storage capacity.
